scripts.build:wasm: bash -lc 'export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH"; if ! command -v rustup >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y; fi; [ -f "$HOME/.cargo/env" ] && . "$HOME/.cargo/env"; rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown; command -v wasm-pack >/dev/null 2>&1 || cargo install wasm-pack --locked --version 0.13.1; command -v wasm-bindgen >/dev/null 2>&1 || cargo install wasm-bindgen-cli --version 0.2.108 --locked; wasm-pack build ../crates/safeparts_wasm --mode no-install --target web --out-dir ../../web/src/wasm_pkg'
